ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag

Class Localisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Localisation

  • public class Localisation
extends java.lang.Object
    Localisation outlines the procedure for both the US angle correction and color position and angle correction by using filtered data from the sensors to update the odometer accordingly
    Author:
    Michael Vaquier, Oliver Clark

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Creates a Localisation object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void colorLocalisation()
      Performs the color localisation routine assuming the robot is positioned relatively close to an intersection of two lines
      void resumeThread()
      This method wakes up all threads that were paused within this instance of Localisation instance
      void usLocalisation()
      Performs the ultrasonic localisation routine assuming the robot's rotating center is on the 45° line in one of the four corners of the Game board.
